item.title: OK Google, water the garden!
item.description: Let’s face it, my brain is just not compatible with any device that has a segment display or more than one button. Whether it’s a scientific calculator, thermostat, or water irrigation controller…

item.title: 7 Deadly ☠️ Sins of OKRs 🎯
item.description: Are you implementing Objectives and Key Results across your company and don’t want your colleagues to feel frustrated after the first couple of few weeks?

item.title: Building A Culture of Relationships That Persist
item.description: What does it take to build a flourishing company culture? And how to recognize one? Real-world examples of good and bad habits, substantial and irrelevant indicators.

item.title: How I Changed My Life in Three Steps
item.description: The year 2018 was absolutely groundbreaking to me. I completely reorganized my life and I feel that I’m happier than I’ve ever been in my life. If something troubles you or you’d like to change your life for the better, here’s a three-step recipe.
